name: matching-game-base
description: This package.json file is not meant to manage dependencies, it's really just a way of knitting commands in each of the code base's (e.g. gameSource, electron-version, etc) package.json files together.

scripts.build:electron: cd gameSource && npm run build:electron && cd ../electron-version && npm run dev

author: Chris Schmitz <schmitz.chris@gmail.com> (https://github.com/chris-schmitz)
